issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create an simple alloy app for blackberry which has a button on a window
2. Run it on BB emulator/device
3. Now change the positioning of the button & add another control to the code
4. Run the app again on BB simulator/device

Actual Result:
1. The changes done in the code do not reflect when the app is re reun on the simulator/device.
2. Now run the code with the new changes for IOS simulator
3. After the app launches in the IOS simulator run it on BB simulator/device again.
4. Note that the changes we made in the positioning & a new control are now being seen

Expected Result:
1. The changes in the code should be reflected in the app immediately

App attached for reference
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Alloy : Any changes in the code are not reflected in the BB build till we build the same app for IOS or android first
